pkgmetadata.longdescription: Non-Linear Transformation Models // Fits a non-linear transformation model ('nltm') for analyzing survival data, see Tsodikov (2003) doi:10.1111/1467-9868.00414. The class of 'nltm' includes the following currently supported models: Cox proportional hazard, proportional hazard cure, proportional odds, proportional hazard - proportional hazard cure, proportional hazard - proportional odds cure, Gamma frailty, and proportional hazard - proportional odds.
